reviewText:
My grandson has been looking for this series for some time.  He races ATVs and
loves DVDs about his favorite sport.  I hope there will be more in this series.

Bought this and Fall Out 2 on a whim cause I wanted something to watch that wasn't a movie but not youtubeish....and I got what I was looking for!!

Great fun, and it's awesome to see what is being done on ATV's!!  The things they are doing on ATV's are the same things you are seeing on Dirt bikes!!  It's amazing to see someone do a back flip on a atv!!

Great family fun here.....
